# Sample S4P Files

This directory should contain sample S4P (4-port S-parameter) files for testing.

## Expected Files

- `sample.s4p` - Basic 4-port S-parameter file

## File Format

S4P files should be in Touchstone format (standard S-parameter file format).

## Note

Actual S-parameter files are binary/text data files. For now, this directory serves as a placeholder.
When implementing Phase 1, create actual S4P files using scikit-rf or obtain real test data.
